select id as id,customer_name as customerName,card,order_no as orderNo, product_name_name as productNameName,contract_no as contract_no,creat_time as creatTime from mag_order where 1=1
and card like '%${card}%'

and contract_no is not null order by creat_time desc

SELECT mac.id,mac.merchant_id,mac.USER_ID,mac.CUSTOMER_ID,mac.customer_type, mac.tel,mac.channel,mac.CREAT_TIME,mac. ALTER_TIME,mac. state,mac.APEX1,mac.APEX2, mac.APEX3,mac.BAK,mac.count_name,mac.user_name,mac.card_num,mac.card_type,mac.count_type,mac.gold_account, mac.draw_password,mac.login_password,mac.province_id,mac.account_province,mac.city_id,mac.account_city, mac.account_bank_id,mac.account_bank,mac.account_branch_bank,mac.channel_name,mac.begin_time,mac.bank_card, mac.end_time FROM mag_customer_account mac where mac.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId}
SELECT mac.staging_services_rate,mac.interest_rate,mac.contract_rate FROM pro_working_product_detail mac where mac.crm_product_id = #{productId} and mac.periods = #{periods}

SELECT mt.id, mt.name,mt.content,mt.content_no_bq, mt.template_type,mt.state,mt.create_time, mt.order_id,mc.ID,mc.customer_id, mc.order_id, mc.contract_amount,mc.CREAT_TIME as start_time, mc.contract_name,mc.manager, mc.protocol_name, mc.contract_no, mc.interest, mc.begin_date, mc.end_date, mc.day, mc.bank,mc.bank_subbranch, mc.product_name, mc.account, mc.account_name, mc.loan_amount,mc.amount,mc.applay_time, mc.contract_rate, mc.befor_service_rate, mc.product_type,mc.product_type_name, mc.product_name_name,mc.product_detail,mc.product_detail_name,mc.product_code, p.id,p.product_id,p.product_amount, p.product_periods, p.product_com_fee,p.li_xi, p.zhifu_fee, p.fengxian_fee,p.yuqi_fee,p.zhina_fee, p.shenhe_fee,p.state,p.zhanghu_fee,cu.tel,cu.id,cu.card,cu.card_register_address,cu.PERSON_NAME FROM mag_template mt INNER JOIN mag_order_contract mc ON mt.order_id = mc.order_id INNER JOIN mag_product_fee p ON p.product_id = mc.product_name INNER JOIN mag_customer cu ON cu.id = mc.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE mt.template_type = #{template_type} and p.product_id= #{product_id} and cu.tel=#{tel}

select product_amount, product_periods, product_com_fee,(SELECT pwpd.contract_rate from pro_working_product_detail pwpd WHERE pwpd.id= o.product_detail) as li_xi,zhifu_fee, fengxian_fee,yuqi_fee,zhina_fee, shenhe_fee,zhanghu_fee from mag_product_fee p LEFT JOIN mag_order o on p.product_id=o.product_detail where p.state='0' and o.id=#{order_id}
select content,content_no_bq,name from mag_template where template_type=#{template_type} and state=1
select c.card_register_address from mag_customer c,mag_order o where c.card=o.card and o.id=#{order_id}
select a.creat_time,a.tel,c.person_name,c.card from app_user a,mag_customer c where a.id=c.user_id and a.id=#{user_id}
